name: Mosh
description:
Entry for Nordic Game Jam 2015

2 players use XBox controllers.

Left analog to move, right analog to shoot, A-button jumps

Pick up the weapon and shoot your friend

So obvious it hurts

Credz:

Art: Dennis Gustafsson

Music: Erik Bucholtz

Code: Ulf Wikström, Sebastien Bellanger

Love and Support: Jeff Ho

email: ulfwikstrom@gmail.com
